attributes.action: Let him know that here in Canada we approve all he is doing for peace in the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr.Prime Minister: We are very deep admirers of you and all you do.
We visit England very regularly and 
we wish we have the good luck of the English people. We hope that our new Prime Minister Mr.Harper keeps on 
following the steps of great World Leaders like you.
Rudy Dutto

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
